feed.title: Ente Auth Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] Add onPressed color for Custom Keyboard in App Lock by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3361
  • [auth][l10n]: Add Bulgarian translation by @Crea7orX in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3402
  • [auth] Minor fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3403
  • Update auth faq.md by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3415
  • [auth] Make compact mode default & minor fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3416
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3414
  • [auth] Request authentication to view passkeys by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3424
  • [auth] Added and updated icons by @cgmccurdy in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3419
  • [AUTH] Replace Icon for bybit.com by @zDqrK404 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3279
  • [auth] Minor improvements by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3443

New Contributors

  • @Crea7orX made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3402
  • @cgmccurdy made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3419
  • @zDqrK404 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3279

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.0.0...auth-v4.0.1

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Format 7/8/9 digit codes
  • Fixed bug in handling account Name with colon character.
  • Increased the frequency to refresh code on UI
  • Pulled latest icons form simple-icons repo

Ref https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3455

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.0.1...auth-v4.0.2

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] Auth minor improvements & bug fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3475
  • Add altName back to T-Mobile icon that was previously removed from json by @casualsailo in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3465
  • [auth] Enable l10n for Vietnamese, Arabic, Greek, & Slovak by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3476
  • [auth] add show notes for mobile and desktop menu by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3451
  • [auth] fix x64 installer on arm64 Windows by @omove in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3502
  • [auth] Add Wargaming icon by @sv3nnie in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3529
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3534
  • [auth] update dependencies for ios by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3577
  • [auth][macos] show hidden window when user clicks on the dock by @tmikus in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3582
  • [auth][mac] bump versions in Podfile.lock by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3583
  • [auth] Auth lockscreen fixes by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3545
  • Add installation instructions for Auth by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3605
  • Add Obtainium links to docs by @Hamster45105 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3642
  • [auth][win] remove win_http_client.dart by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3578
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3599
  • [auth] Add custom icons for Simplicity, RealMe, and PBTech by @wiki-Bird in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3549
  • Improvements to the Auth FAQs by @jake-anto in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3682
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3691
  • [auth]Added Logos & Added altName by @LauShyO in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3482
  • [auth] Alt names not being formatted when processing by @Choromanski in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3516
  • [auth] fix: don't use GNOME header bar outside of GNOME by @Merrit in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3688
  • [auth] updated icons for dark/light modes by @cgmccurdy in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3535
  • [auth] fix(linux): generic icon on Wayland sessions by @Merrit in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3737
  • [auth] Bugfix/auth icons with period by @Choromanski in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3559
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3782
  • [auth] fix formatting in custom_icons by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3773
  • [mob][auth] Fix detection of default locale by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3819
  • Update custom-icons.json for impact.com by @SaijoGeorge in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3820
  • [auth] improve packaging and db path by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3334
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3863
  • Add new icons by @LeGenDaRy15PT in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3776
  • [auth] Fix case insensitive rename by @mnvr in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3871
  • [AUTH] Add Icon for DigiFinex.com by @zDqrK404 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3858
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3918
  • [AUTH] Add icon for Carta.com, KnownHost.com, TRowePrice.com by @alexrirak in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3908
  • [Auth - Custom Icons] Fixed spelling mistake for Ubiquiti SSO by @KingLuc12 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3877
  • [Auth] New icons by @schipht in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3854
  • [auth] Bump version v4.1.0 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3940

Security Updates

  • Issue reported by @alexbakker that would allow device credential based app lock to be short-circuited has been fixed.

New Contributors

  • @omove made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3502
  • @setalp made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3538
  • @tmikus made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3582
  • @Hamster45105 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3642
  • @wiki-Bird made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3549
  • @jake-anto made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3682
  • @LauShyO made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3482
  • @Choromanski made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3516
  • @Merrit made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3688
  • @SaijoGeorge made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3820
  • @KingLuc12 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3825
  • @LeGenDaRy15PT made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3776
  • @alexrirak made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3908

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.0.2...auth-v4.1.0

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.1.5
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Allow sorting by account name, most frequently used, recently used, and custom sort order.
  • Added an option to fall back to TOTP when both passkey and TOTP are enabled.
  • Fixed: Clicking the search icon now automatically focuses on the search text input.
  • Added more icons and translations, thanks to the community.

Change log

  • [Auth] Fix title typo by @schipht in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3946
  • Added Custom Icon for Ko-fi by @NanoBunTV in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3956
  • Add Custom Icon for PebbleHost, Restream, and Terabit by @NanoBunTV in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3964
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4009
  • An attempt to fix the Custom Icon for Coinbase by @NanoBunTV in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3995
  • Add three new icons by @DerBraky in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4011
  • Create custom icon for authentik by @tigattack in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4029
  • [auth] Implement Custom Sorting by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4072
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4070
  • Added Bluesky logo by @nikunjkumarnakum in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4061
  • [auth][l10n]: Add Catalan translation by @xeanhort in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4052
  • Fix auth icons by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4108
  • [mob][auth] Send signup as purpose during registration by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4133
  • [AUTH] Fix logo for KnownHost.com + Add dark mode support to Carta.com logo by @alexrirak in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4121
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4164
  • Update Instagram icon by @DerBraky in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4173
  • [mob][auth] Send login purpose during ott by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4227
  • [auth] Add Goverment of Canada Icon by @jincao1 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4172
  • [auth][search] fix focus on search icon tap by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4249
  • [auth] Add "Favorites" Tag to Display Pinned Codes by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4266
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4278
  • [auth] Add Fidelity icon by @0xedward in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4195
  • [auth] Updated binance and added dropbox by @nikunjkumarnakum in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4230
  • Add Pushover icon by @0xedward in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4242
  • [auth] Add Bugzilla icon by @0xedward in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4243
  • [auth][ios] fix compatibility for ios < 13 by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4252
  • [auth][migration] migrate db correctly by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4250
  • [auth] Remove duplicated icon by @mnvr in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4288
  • [auth] Allow only lower_case letter and underscore in custom icon name by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4301
  • [auth] Rename pin/unpin to fav/unfav by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4302
  • [auth] Fix sorting + add option to sort by recently and most frequently used by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4304
  • [auth] Add SpaceHey and Wolvesville icons by @down-bad in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4291
  • [auth] Fix sorting & bump version by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4305
  • [auth] Keep favorite enteries on top in all cases except custom sort by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4316
  • [auth] Minor fixes for custom order by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4319

New Contributors

  • @NanoBunTV made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3956
  • @tigattack made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4029
  • @DerBraky made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4011
  • @xeanhort made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4052
  • @jincao1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4172
  • @0xedward made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4195
  • @down-bad made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4291

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.1.0...auth-v4.1.5

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v4.1.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] Bump version v4.1.5 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4326
  • [auth] Fix theme switch for windows & linux by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4327
  • [auth] Fixed bad custom icon json & altName matching by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4328
  • [auth] Bump version by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4341

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v4.1.5...auth-v4.1.6
